name: Nickelodeon Fit
description: Nickelodeon Fit is an exciting new way for kids to stay physically active as they exercise and engage with their favorite Nickelodeon friends: Dora, Diego, Kai-lan and The Backyardigans. Developed in collaboration with a children’s fitness specialist, Nickelodeon Fit offers 30 exercise games that promote strength, balance, coordination and heart health. Jump rope with The Backyardigans, pogo stick with Dora, go river rafting with Diego, leap over hurdles with Kai-lan, and more! Parents can monitor their child’s physical activity and customize routines to meet their child’s needs. Works with either the Wii Balance Board or the Wii Remote.
